zombies.name: <color=#4B0082><u>Giga Football Archduke</u>
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Awakened from the silence of eternity, the Giga Football Archduke charges day after day, fights, conquers again, and forges terrifying victories. Beneath him rides a Cossack warhorse, and the armor personally gifted by Doctor Edgar serves as his proof of honor. Whoever opposes him is against the whole world: behind the wind-whipping commanding's flag follows the entire realm. He brings a dark greeting; wherever his saber strikes, night falls, curtains descend, and a new order rises, as if declaring to all plants: this is the price of defying him.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>"Hey! Do you dare challenge me on horseback?"

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>80/0.1s</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>36000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Mini-boss. Immune to chill, knock-backs and stuns. Crushes plants. 
<color=black>•</color> Heals for 200 HP every 0.1s.
<color=black>•</color> Without blocking plants, he can appear in as far as the fifth column from the right and then charges, riding a warhorse that crushes plants.
<color=black>•</color> After each charge, pauses for ~1.5s, then can charge once every 10s.
<color=black>•</color> Charges apply a 5s curse to plants in a 3×3 area on collision, transferring all final damage he receives to the cursed plants (up to 5k shared).
<color=black>•</color> When HP drops below 2/3 for the first time, spawns a Giga Buckshot Commando in each lane. Upon reaching 0 HP, dismounts and becomes Dismounted Archduke.</color>

zombies.name: <color=#4B0082>Dismounted Archduke
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Giga Football Archduke has known Giga Football Striker for a long time. They attack gardens together, train soldiers, and compete for deputies. In their spare time, they play intense real-life Chinese chess, with subordinates as pieces and the two commanders directing from the center—though they often can't resist moving outside the nine-square board.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A fallen commander, no longer wielding power.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>80/0.1s; 100 (bite)</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>18000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to knock-backs.</color>

zombies.name: Gatling Cherry Scholar Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"There's always more to life than just math puzzles… like the reed outside the window… or tonight's moonlight," mumbles Gatling Cherry Scholar Zombie. "But first, I really need to solve this Sudoku. It's… surprisingly hard."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Fires a rapid barrage of explosive cherry rounds when angered.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>400 (bite) 1000 (explosive cherry)</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>1500 + 1500 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from Scholar Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> After losing his paper, fires 4 explosive cherry bullets every 0.5s.</color>

zombies.name: Gatling Cherry Bachelor Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A renowned demolition lecturer at Zombie International University, Gatling Cherry Bachelor Zombie only agreed to come after Professor Cherryz promised three things: cherry pie, big explosions, and Zuma. "Good ol' Cherryz wasn't wrong," he says.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Fires explosive cherries even before getting angry.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>400 (bite) 1000 (explosive cherry)</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from previous tier(s).
<color=black>•</color> Fires 4 explosive cherries every 1.5s even before losing his newspaper.</color>

zombies.name: Gatling Cherry Doctor Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>To advance in explosive sciences, Gatling Cherry Doctor Zombie is heading abroad. His cherry pie stash strapped to his back? Just part of being prepared.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Graduated magna cum bombis — ready to show it.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>400 (bite) 1000 (explosive cherry)</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 2)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from previous tier(s).
<color=black>•</color> When angered, picks up his ammo pack and fires 1 extra cherry every 0.5s.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Football Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Tired of the spotlight, Giga Football Zombie swapped out his bright red jersey for a pitch-black one that blends into the night. Unfortunately, the new look makes him resemble a bank robber more than a footballer.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A linebacker geared for stealth.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Football-nut Elite Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Emerging from the depths of an eerie realm, Giga Football-nut Elite Zombie is a living mystery. He embodies being dark, dangerous, and disoriented. Even he can't recall his origins, only that the past feels like a lucid dream that fades with dawn.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A hardened warrior, fearless in the dark.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000 + 12000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie. 
<color=black>•</color> Regenerates 5% max HP every 3s.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Football-nut Leader Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Right-hand zombie to the Striker, Giga Football-nut Leader is admired by subordinates and trusted by command. He's loyal, skilled, and confused why commendations never come in the form of fresh brains.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Tears through the frontlines with ruthless power.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>200 (bite)</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>24000 + 24000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from previous tier(s).
<color=black>•</color> Immune to knockback, chill, and butter.
<color=black>•</color> Bites disable plant healing and make victims receive triple damage for 1s.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Buckshot Leader Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Feared on the battlefield, beloved off it. Giga Buckshot Leader dazzles troops with his signature trick: hiding bullets in his banner.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Suppressive fire that doesn't cease.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>200 (bite) 80/0.1s (iron pea)</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>24000 + 24000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Immune to knockback, chill, and butter.</color>

zombies.name: Sergeant Michael Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Zombie pop idol and fan-favorite, Sergeant Michael Zombie can't go anywhere without a swarm of screaming fans. He's learning new moves not just for his global tour, but to dodge fangirls.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Enters in moonwalk with backup dancers.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Enters with 3s moonwalk, then summons 4 Super Dancing Pole Vaulters.</color>

zombies.name: Commander Michael Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>At the peak of fame, power, and performance, Commander Michael Zombie just needs a stage to share his joy with the world.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Moonwalks in style, then rallies the crowd.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Enters with a 3s sliding moonwalk. On reaching 4th column or being blocked, ends moonwalk and then summons 4 Super Dancing Pole Vaulters.</color>

zombies.name: General Michael Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Dashing steps, haunting twirls. The dance prodigy has outgrown the Edgar Academy. Now, fresh from Jackson Dance Academy, he's shooting an MV with his bodyguard's help. Don't forget to film his signature 45° bow — if you survive.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Stylish arrival, dazzling encore.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Ignores plants for 3s while sliding in with a moonwalk to the 4th column. Then summons 8 Super Dancing Pole Vaulters.</color>

zombies.name: Sharkmarine-X
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A knockoff developed by a rival of Gfishtus Corps. It's said to perform identically to the original, but Gfishtus insists this model leaks.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Edgar's latest mass-produced submarine unit.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Moves swiftly in water lanes, crushing any plants in its path, dealing 500 Damage to anti-crush plants.</color>

zombies.name: Destroyer Sharkmarine
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Flawless" weapons are overrated. A true victory lies in overwhelming missile fire raining from the skies. This modified mine-layer submarine functions as a mobile underwater missile silo, the starter of that fire.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Lobs bombs nonstop at the frontline.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Fires 1 bomb every 1.5s aimed at 2 tiles ahead. The bomb explodes like a Jack-in-the-Box explosion but can be shot down if it takes 1000 damage mid-air.</color>

zombies.name: Charger Sharkmarine
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>This turbo-powered sub's sole purpose: charge into and disrupt enemy lines, creating weak spots for allies to attack. Critics say it sacrifices too much for speed, but Edgar shrugs—"All I need is moving forward, at all costs."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Blitzes the water lanes at reckless speed.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Rushes down water lane plants with extreme speed.</color>

zombies.name: Boomer Sharkmarine
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The ultimate battlefield dominator, this submarine is the brainchild of Edgar and Gfishtus Corps. After solving the missile flooding issue, it's now flawless, except for seaweed occasionally jamming the propeller.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Rises to bombard the backline with cruise missiles.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Enters the field submerged. Surfaces when there are plants in its lane and stops moving.
<color=black>•</color> While surfaced, fires 2 missiles every 1.5s aimed at the last column. The missile explodes like a Jack-in-the-Box explosion but can be shot down if it takes 1000 damage mid-air or blown away by Blovers.</color>

zombies.name: Narwhalmarine
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Edgar's proudest innovation, designed for maximum acceleration. All crew must pass brutal G-force centrifuge tests. "It's like ten Gargantuars sat on you," says one survivor.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>The steel spear of the water lanes.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Charges at extreme speed, cutting through water lane plants.
<color=black>•</color> Once per unit, doubles movement speed of all zombies in a 3×3 area (stackable up to 2 times).</color>

zombies.name: Giga Trident Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Wearing waterproof overalls and wielding a shiny trident, he's ready to fish. Don't forget the helmet — it's less for protection from plants, more for defense against jealous fishermen.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Throws tridents at your backline.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> 6-9s after entering or when blocked, throws 4 tridents at the last column.
<color=black>•</color> Each trident causes damage to plants equal to 20% (minimum of 60) of their current Toughness.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Trident-nut Firstmate Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Armed with eye drops and a reinforced Tallnut helmet, he's ready to spear the catch of the day, or his rivals.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>You can't dodge what he targets.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> 6-9s after entering or when blocked, throws 8 tridents at random plants 4 tiles ahead (unaffected by Umbrellas).
<color=black>•</color> Base trident damage +100.</color>

zombies.name: Giga Trident-nut Captain Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A mighty warrior once slated for forklift duty — until he failed the helmet size test. So now he simply hurls more tridents, harder.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Tridents rain down in scattershot.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000 + 12000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> 6-9s after entering or when blocked, throws 12 cluster tridents.
<color=black>•</color> Splits into 1 extra trident for each plant 4 tiles ahead. 
<color=black>•</color> Base trident damage +300.</color>

zombies.name: Netherite Miner Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>With a netherite pickaxe and forged mining license, this zombie set off to strike a coal deal with Queen Endoflame — though Piglin Corp's Wither Skeleton trafficking ring might prove stiff competition.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Fastest digger in the Nether mines.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Each attack adds 2000 mining progress to the plant. If mining progress exceeds the plant's HP, the plant is instantly destroyed.</color>

zombies.name: Netherite Driller Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Praised at excavation contests for his lava-fueled netherite drill. Though he always forgets to mention that his hoe is also netherite, the dedication!</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Digs tunnels but gets easily lost.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Each attack adds 4000 mining progress to the plant.
<color=black>•</color> Digs underground and his drill cannot be pulled by Magnet-shrooms while underground.
<color=black>•</color> Emerges randomly between columns 2-8.</color>

zombies.name: Netherite Excavator Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Head of the Zombie's Nether Mining Bureau followed by hundreds of eager, labor-worthy zombies, he dreams of a mining empire. Edgar scoffs: "He just keeps tunneling into other zombies' graves since he's blinded by his helmet. That's why they're always chasing him."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Leads other zombies underground in one big dig.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000 + 12000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Each attack adds 8000 mining progress to the plant.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits from previous tier(s).
<color=black>•</color> Enters underground with nearby non-vehicle zombies. They emerge together later.</color>

zombies.name: Plated Michael Zomboni
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Charge, charge again, crush everything! The Zomboni plowed through the field with unstoppable momentum, until it met the pond in the middle of the lawn.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Disco zombie driving a reinforced vehicle.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Crushes plants. Has a 50% damage reduction.
<color=black>•</color> Spawns a standard Michael Zombie upon death.</color>

zombies.name: Armored Michael Zomboni
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"We've added more layers to the front armor!" The newly refurbished vehicle is now the pride of Michael Zombie, though he regrets that the gaps between the armor layers still aren't wide enough to stuff in more backup dancers.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Michael Zombie's vehicle now includes an extra layer of light armor.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Crushes plants. Has a 66% damage reduction.
<color=black>•</color> Spawns a Plated Michael Zomboni upon death.</color>

zombies.name: Colossus Michael Zomboni
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>This vehicle's extremely thick armor has earned it the nickname "Battleship on Land". Lately, Michael Zombie has come up with yet another bold new design: swap the base for treads, install a multi-layer turret, and mount a long-barreled cannon. He believes this will be a truly original invention.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Michael Zombie's vehicle now includes two layers of heavy steel armor.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>24000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Crushes plants. Has a 75% damage reduction.
<color=black>•</color> Spawns a Armored Michael Zomboni upon death.</color>

zombies.name: Knight Clown-on-the-Pogo Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Don't bother him—he's in love. He's not in the mood to hear your pessimistic take on his romance, and if you try, you'll be met with an explosively emotional response.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Pogo zombie with a modern explosive-loaded pogo stick. Only slightly magnetic and difficult to disarm.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits Clown-on-the-Pogo Zombie traits.
<color=black>•</color> Does not lose pogo stick if knocked back by Umbrellas.
<color=black>•</color> If killed while still holding the stick, triggers a Jack-in-the-Box explosion.</color>

zombies.name: King Clown-on-the-Pogo Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>He once struggled with poor sales of pogo sticks, watermelons, and jack-in-the-boxes. So he consulted Catapult Zombie. "You've got to imagine the watermelon and jack-in-the-box as one," the advice went. Judging by the explosive success, it worked.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Equipped with a single-use charger for his explosive pogo stick.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits the traits of Knight Clown-on-the-Pogo Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> If spawned on the right half of the field, charges up for 5s and then makes a long leap of about 4 tiles.</color>

zombies.name: Emperor Clown-on-the-Pogo Zombie
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>After much time, he's finally overcome the pain of his breakup. Now he's dressed in flashy colors and ready to court a new goddess. He's now pursuing Queen Jill-in-the-Box. Hopefully, his emotional stamina has improved.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>With an upgraded charging system, the smoke from his explosive pogo stick masks his decoy stand-in.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000 + 12000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits the traits of King Clown-on-the-Pogo Zombie but charging duration is reduced to 0.75s.
<color=black>•</color> Can cheat death if holding his pogo stick.</color>

zombies.name: Kirov Bomber
zombies.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>Since top-of-the-line parts aren't windfall, Gfishtus Corps thought it would be cost efficient to make a simplified model for lower scale attacks. Though ultimately they just made an airship that is uncannily similar to Dr. Zomboss' original model...

- Written by Mr. Etc.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A Kirov airship that periodically drops Jack-in-the-Box bombs.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>500/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Crashes after taking 20 hits from Magnetar stars.</color>

zombies.name: Kirov Mothership
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The Kirov mothership is a core product of Gfishtus Corps, and the company claims it uses cutting-edge drone technology. But if you examine the debris of its minions closely, you'll often find "CCCP" painted in red.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>An aerial mothership that deploys Kirovs Drones.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Every ~2 seconds, summons a Kirov Drone with 0.1× its own HP.
<color=black>•</color> Crashes after taking 30 hits from Magnetar stars.</color>

zombies.name: Kirov Flagship
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>High-altitude infiltration! Integrated recon and assault! Total firepower coverage! Fully digitalized unmanned combat! Gfishtus Corps proudly presents Kirov 2.0! It's the ultimate beast, except for the ridiculously short flight range that relegates it to being a mere frigate under a larger mothership. The mothership, of course, is sold separately.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>An aerial supremacy that deploys rapid carpet bombers.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>300/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Every ~4 seconds, summons 2 Supersonic Bombers to quickly decimate the lane.
<color=black>•</color> Crashes after taking 40 hits from Magnetar stars.</color>

zombies.name: Restless Wraith
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Born into poverty, I was fortunate to be sponsored by a wealthy patron and gained an education. I later served as an upright official, speaking frankly at court. People said the Emperor was a tyrant, yet though he ignored my counsel, he never punished me. Only later did I learn: the Emperor was deaf.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A reanimated spirit that explodes upon death, harming all green life in its wake.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>250 (non-bite)</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> When killed by damage, deals 125 damage to all plants in a 3×3 area.</color>

zombies.name: Immortal Wraith
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The night wraith soared, scattering all allies. Two plants stood in its path. Enraged, it struck — one fell, and the other tried to resist. The wraith burst forward, piercing both, and finished them off with brutal strikes. Brave they were, but both perished in an instant. What more could they do? Laughable.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A phantasmal spectre that cuts through barriers with ghostly force.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>500 (non-bite)</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Every 4-8 seconds, dashes forward for up to 2 tiles, ignoring plants and dealing damage.
<color=black>•</color> When killed by damage, deals 250 damage to all plants in a 3×3 area.</color>

zombies.name: Eternal Wraith
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Li Chi-hsing, a native of Fengdu, once said as a boy, "I can see a jade seal there — it belongs to my family." Everyone laughed. At 24, amid famine, he rose in rebellion and declared himself king of Fengdu. When he received the jade seal, it scorched his face. The next year brought another famine. He was ousted, barely escaping with his life. His tongue wounded by the seal, when asked his name, he could only mumble: "I'm Li..ch.."</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>A wraith that phases through plants and strikes with imperial wrath.

<color=black>Damage: </color><color=#4B0082>300/1.5s</color>
<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>12000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> On the right side of the lawn, every 4-8 seconds, phases through up to 4 tiles ignoring plants, reaching as far into the row as possible and dealing damage along the way. If no bypassable plants are present, dashes forward 1 tile instead.
<color=black>•</color> On the left side, attempting to phase disables this skill.
<color=black>•</color> When killed by damage, deals 500 damage to all plants in a 3×3 area.</color>

zombies.name: Trident Light Hwacha
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"When pear blossoms bloom across the land, the river flows beneath soft gauze." Trident Light Hwacha read this ballad in a yellowing book, moved by the legend behind it. Unfortunately, it did not understand that rockets need engines to fly far.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Unleashes a small wave of tridents.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 1 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Attacks by firing 4 tridents at once, can reload and fire again once, then resumes moving forward and crushing plants. Tridents land 5-7 tiles ahead.</color>

zombies.name: Trident Medium Hwacha
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Training with the Trident Medium Hwacha involves unique precision drills. Since the tridents can't change trajectory mid-air, the driver must reposition the entire cart for aiming. "Adjust slightly… more… just a bit—" Splash! The cart tumbles into a nearby pond.</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Unleashes a larger wave of tridents.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>3000 + 3000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 2 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits of Trident Light Hwacha but fires 14 tridents per salvo.</color>

zombies.name: Trident Heavy Hwacha
zombies.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>A veteran trident warrior, decorated and seasoned, has joined the Hwacha Division as its newest unit. He has hunted Snowfurs in the tundra and fought crocodiles in the swamps. Now he stands before you, ready to battle. Let's see — can you dodge this?</color>
zombies.info:
<size=36>Unleashes tridents that scatter on death.

<color=black>Toughness: </color><color=#4B0082>6000 + 6000 (Type 1)</color>
<color=black>Traits: </color><color=#4B0082>
<color=black>•</color> Tier 3 Evolved Zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Inherits traits of Trident Medium Hwacha.
<color=black>•</color> Upon death, unused tridents scatter randomly within 3.5 tiles in its lane, damaging all plants hit.</color>
